Dim thisItem As Item = Me 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
' promote all unreleased child Nodes to "Released" -- Dim docHierarchyRels As Item = Me.newItem("","") Dim amlCmd As String = "<Item type='Document Hierarchy' action='get' serverEvents='0' >" amlCmd = amlCmd & "<source_id>" & Me.GetID() & "</source_id>" amlCmd = amlCmd & "<related_id><Item type='Document Section' action='get' serverEvents='0' >" amlCmd = amlCmd & "<is_released>0</is_released></Item></related_id>" amlCmd = amlCmd & "</Item>" docHierarchyRels.loadAML(amlCmd) docHierarchyRels = docHierarchyRels.apply()
Dim i As Integer Dim promoteItem As Item = Me.newItem("","")
Dim suIdentityWasGranted As Boolean Dim suIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity suIdentity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Aras PLM") suIdentityWasGranted = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(suIdentity)
For i=0 To docHierarchyRels.getItemCount() -1 amlCmd = "<Item type='Document Section' action='promoteItem' id='" amlCmd = amlCmd & docHierarchyRels.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("related_id","invalid") & "' >" amlCmd = amlCmd & "<state>Released</state>" amlCmd = amlCmd & "</Item>"
promoteItem.loadAML(amlCmd) promoteItem = promoteItem.apply()
If promoteItem.isError() Then Return promoteItem Next i
If suIdentityWasGranted Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(suIdentity)
Return Me
